programme.desc: The morning of September 11, 2001 began routinely but by 9:00 AM, the day's narrative had taken a tragic turn. This is an account of the tragedy as it unfolded, and as it aired in American cities large and small, told without narration or interviews.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: Take an unprecedented look at the tragic attack on Pearl Harbour through news reports, public statements, recently declassified documents, and footage recorded in the days before, during, and after the event that shook the world.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: After the acquittal of four Los Angeles police officers who beat African American Rodney King, the city erupted into chaos. Take a real-time look at the turmoil that led to 54 deaths, nearly 12,000 arrests, and over $1 billion in damages.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes
programme.desc: From heiress of a giant media empire to wanted felon, witness the strange saga of the Patty Hearst kidnapping of 1974.

Now, paleontologists at Canada's Royal Tyrrell Museum have taken on the roles of forensic detectives to determine where it came from, how it died, and why this land based creature wound up in an area that was once an inland sea.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Unseasonably cold summer weather causes difficulties for several animals in the Yorkshire Dales and North York Moors, including an injured roe deer and her twins.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Autumn is on hold as summer continues, with unexpectedly balmy conditions throwing a life line to the roe deer as they prepare for the winter ahead. For other animals, mating season has arrived, making for a testosterone-fuelled time at Ravenscar Beach.

programme.title: Yorkshire: A Year In The Wild
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the Grey Seals at Ravenscar Beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on.

programme.title: Destination Myanmar
programme.desc: Destination Myanmar will take the audience to some of Myanmar's most beautiful and stunning Asian Heritage wetlands with fishermen paddling one-legged along shallow waters and floating gardens.

programme.title: Bornean Elephants
programme.desc: The documentary takes the perspective of Bornean elephants in Sabah as they traverse through the landscape and show how these gentle giants can coexist with humans amidst different challenges faced.

programme.title: The Mountain Lion And Me
programme.desc: Follow the lives of an elusive mountain lion and her three cubs in Paradise Valley, Montana. Get a rare glimpse into their lives and a deeper understanding of a previously unknown animal.

programme.title: Around The World With Manu Feildel
programme.desc: Manu heads to Hong Kong, the fourth country on his around the world tour, and he has some great food excursions lined up. Chicken feet, Tim Ho Wan, street food and lots to fit in before he jumps across the pond to Tokyo, Japan.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam's journey to explore China's history through its food continues, as he visits the provinces of Jiangsu and Zhejiang, both considered part of the 8 great regional cuisines of China and celebrated for their wealth and sophistication.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the largest cities in the world Shanghai where he discovers a modern, cosmopolitan and global facing city.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: On his journey discovering China's history through its food, Adam arrives in Shandong - birthplace of Confucius and one of the oldest and most influential culinary traditions in China.

programme.title: Destination Flavour: China
programme.desc: Adam Liaw arrives in one of the most fascinating Chinese provinces - Yunnan. Infused with spice and fragrance from Southeast and Central Asia, people from all around China have fallen in love with this cuisine and culture.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena restaurant-hops with friends Lilly Singh and Laura Marano, indulging in plant-based French pastries, "pastrami" sammies, Thai "chicken" wings and "carne" asada.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: A diverse group of chefs create mouth-watering plant-based dumplings, fried `chik'n' sandwiches and Vietnamese `catfish'; Mena forages for lobster mushrooms and visits the oldest tofu factory in America.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan
programme.desc: Mena explores his Canadian backyard, discovering delicious plant-based sushi, pistachio cannolis, and pizza; he gets hands-on at a vegan cheese factory with comedian Bassem Youssef.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: With over 50 years in the industry, not many filmmakers can boast the longevity and influence of Steven Spielberg, whose journey from the suburbs of Arizona to the spotlight of Hollywood is one of the greatest stories ever told.

programme.title: The Moviemakers
programme.desc: 60 years since his directorial debut, Martin Scorsese's life has been dedicated to the past, present and future of cinema. Named Caretaker of Cinema, Martin Scorsese continues to push the boundaries of moviemaking.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: From their teeth, and claws, to incredible stealth and cunning, nature’s most lethal predators have evolved a staggering array of hunting techniques.

programme.title: Wildest Survival
programme.desc: In this episode we witness nature’s most extraordinary animal migrations, and discover the lengths they must go to, in order to survive.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of “helpers” from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera – and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Fuse has a new electronic ball. Noddy suggests that they invite everyone to play with it later. Fuse agrees but when Noddy returns with the other toys there is a big brick wall in front of the workshop. No one can get in and there's no sign of Fuse! Noddy uses all his investigating skills to follow the clues. He discovers that Fuse built the brick wall to stop his friends coming into the workshop because he was worried his new electronic ball might get broken. Noddy helps him feel comfortable with sharing his toy ball after all the other toys promise to be super careful with it. Now everyone can play together! Yay for Noddy!

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. programme.title: Dali & Cocky Prince
programme.desc: Price was never a concern for Dali, who was born rich. However, in an overnight, she is left with nothing due to her father's sudden death and bankruptcy. In front of Dali, who is struggling to save the museum that her father wanted to protect until the end, a man shows up, demanding her to pay off a debt of $2,000,000. And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: The Fishermen and the Sea S3
programme.desc: The new season of this Korean fishing variety show, hosted by two celebrity hosts who are fishing enthusiasts, sets sail with celebrity guests such as K-Pop idols Lee Know (Straykids), Yuno (Ateez), and Ha Sung Woon (Wanna One). The programme features some beautiful fishing spots around Korea and shares useful fishing tips with the viewers.

programme.title: Iron Squad 2

Jeff, a former drug trafficker, is forced to join the police as a secret killer in this operation after being caught. His wife decides to join in the operation so as to spare her family from being tortured by the police. A fierce battle has just begun!

programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, police officer Zhang relentlessly hunts them down and accidentally finds himself implicated in a major child abduction case. In the process, he teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the international crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Maid For Revenge
programme.desc: A maid wakes up covered in blood beside her client's pool, with the owner dead in the water, her young son's son's life in jeopardy - and no memory of what has occurred.

programme.title: How to Live Your Best Death
programme.desc: Kristin feels like she's going nowhere in life, so she hires Ashley, a life coach who promises to help Kristin reach her potential. But a shocking discovery reveals that Ashley isn't who she says she is.

programme.title: Nanny Dearest
programme.desc: After receiving fertile eggs from a donor, Rebecca and Caleb conceive a child. Years later, a strange woman appears, oddly drawn to their daughter. Their donor has returned - and she wants what is hers.

programme.title: Bad Nanny
programme.desc: Envious Kendra, born on the wrong side of the tracks and resentful toward her (secret) socialite half-sister Remy, secures a job as a nanny to Remy's daughter.

programme.desc: Rachael's villa would not be complete without a spectacular bedroom. Crew needs to figure out how to create a bedroom with a kitchen in suite, giving new meaning to the phrase "breakfast in bed."

programme.title: Married At First Sight Australia (S9)
programme.desc: After a tense honeymoon, Selin comes home alone. Will Anthony return for the first dinner party of the experiment?

programme.desc: The Top 5 arrive at Stick Shed in Murtoa. The hopefuls will face off for the ultimate Immunity challenge prize: to be the first contestant through to Finals Week, securing a place in the Top 4.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: With one contestant already through to Finals Week, the others must fight for the final 3 spots. Stakes have never been higher as, for one of the cooks, today will be the end of the journey.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: Top 4 face a Mystery Box with a big prize attached. The winner of today’s cook is guaranteed the first spot in the Semi Final. When they lift their lids, it’s clear that it’s going to be an emotional day.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The remaining three are pitted against each other in a bid to claim the other two places. Entering the kitchen, they discover that today’s Pressure Test has been set by none other than Peter Gilmore.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia (S15)
programme.desc: The Top 3 arrive to find the kitchen set up for a cook-along. Today’s challenge represents the gateway to the Semi Final, with a sizeable advantage up for grabs.

programme.title: The Girl Who Wasn't Dead
programme.desc: This is the story of 15-year-old Erica who vanished without a trace. Authorities believed Erica may have been the victim of a local serial killer, but her mother, Carrie refused to believe the worst.

programme.title: Revenge For My Mother
programme.desc: Audrey teaches postnatal fitness to a group of mothers. However, when her recently hired assistant starts exacting revenge, Audrey's perfect world of mums and babies erupts into madness and murder.

programme.title: Lumayo Ka Nga Sa Akin

programme.title: Maid in London

programme.title: Selda

programme.title: CSI S3 E05 - Abra Cadaver
programme.desc: The series enters its third season riding high as network television's top-rated drama. There is, therefore, no need for CBS to make any major cast changes, however, there are two significant additions to the cast lineup for season 3. A romantic interest is created for series regular Jorja Fox (Sara Sidle) in the form of Hank Peddigrew (Christopher Wiehl), a handsome paramedic. Also, recurring character Detective Lockwood ( Jeffrey D. Sams ) is seen on a more frequent basis. The season's most significant story development involves CSI head man Gil Grissom ( William L. Petersen ). After a few instances in which he notices that he is experiencing some hearing loss, Grissom is diagnosed with a hereditary disorder which threatens to culminate in total deafness. As the season draws to a close, Grissom undergoes surgery to correct this problem, however the results of the operation remain unclear until the beginning of season four.

programme.title: Alone: Frozen (S1)
programme.desc: Six Alone veterans take on their biggest - and coldest - challenge yet when they are dropped on the frigid North Atlantic coast just days before the start of winter.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: The team's high hopes of finding the fabled treasure are intensified when they procure what could be the final piece of the puzzle.

programme.title: The Bermuda Triangle: Into Cursed Waters (S2)
programme.desc: Did a Bermuda Triangle tsunami claim two behemoth ships, or did they fall prey to Nazi U-Boats? The team sets its sights on a famous Bermuda Triangle case: the twin vanishings of two massive cargo ships.

programme.title: Alone (S10)
programme.desc: As the remaining survivalists near day 50, conditions at Reindeer Lake intensify. Desperation rises as the temperatures continue to drop, and personal demons bubble to the surface.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: At the height of the industrial age, as America's cities go vertical for the first time, a Yale educated medical doctor and Olympic gold medalist turns his attention to toys.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: Studies have shown that up to 70% of all UFO sightings happen in so-called 'hotspots' where reports of visions and unusual phenomena are witnessed, and not only in modern times, but thousands of years ago.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: Daniel and Dorien call in air support. Meanwhile, Ronnie and Ashley compete in a battle of the sexes. Black Rambo hunts for a legendary payday. While Bruce tries to save his season.

programme.desc: Things get scary when a seller comes in with a letter from Stephen King. Will all work and no play make Corey a dull boy? Then, Chum gets a sweet lesson when he checks out signed Steve Aoki merchandise.

programme.title: The UnBelievable With Dan Aykroyd (S1)
programme.desc: Sometimes the strangest things on Earth are happening just below its surface. These are the weird and wondrous tales of the sea beasts, hidden cities, and impossible creatures that lurk beneath us.

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid
programme.desc: In the Bible, there are two Arks, each designed by God himself. Both the Ark of the Covenant and Noah's Ark were built to protect but lost to history. Did either exist, and if so, where could they be?

programme.title: History's Greatest Heists With Pierce Brosnan (S1)
programme.desc: An elite crew of Italian thieves targets the vault of the Antwerp World Diamond Centre. After 27 months of planning, they execute their intricate plan and make off with more than $100 million.

programme.title: History's Greatest Of All Time With Peyton Manning (S1)
programme.desc: From GI Joe to the Slinky, host Peyton Manning counts down the top ten toys of all time, as voted by a panel of experts. Which one of your childhood favourites will be crowned the best of the best?

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S9)
programme.desc: In a new twist on the classic car challenge, four smiths create a knife from a mangled mess of a vehicle. After an intense round of testing, two smiths return home to recreate a set of curved katars.

programme.title: Kanto Boy 2 (Anak ni Totoy Gwapo)

programme.title: Alyas Baby Tsino (Tatagos sa Puso)
programme.desc: It’s a world where greed and violence is the rule. It’s world where one has to go with the flow in order to survive. And for a man who stick by his guns, it’s worse than hell. He must risk his life and even those he cares for in order for all of them to get out of the dark hole well and alive.

programme.title: Pangako ng Kahapon

programme.title: Una Kang Naging Akin
programme.desc: Is there any way for Gabby to regain his other "memory" and remember the family he left behind?

programme.desc: Explore hacks for all ages, from staying clean while eating ribs, to staying young in your golden years. Plus, watch hacks for making soap and hanging shelves, and get ready to welcome the twist tie to the All Star Club.

programme.title: East New York S1 2
programme.desc: Regina Haywood fights to ensure two cases receive the same resources to bring the perpetrators to justice.

programme.title: East New York S1 3
programme.desc: The team crosses paths with a businessman who may have been the intended target. Deputy Inspector Haywood tries to help a troubled teen. Killian is at odds with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 09
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin learn how to get zippers unstuck with the help of Graphite Man, and find out if a lawnmower made out of a bike is hack or wack. Plus, they'll test the best hacks for brushing your teeth when you forget your toothbrush.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 10
programme.desc: Learn how to get gum out of your hair and how to survive a zombie apocalypse. Plus, welcome a broomstick to the All Star Club, find out the real way to remove permanent marker, and discover a new Hack from History: the lawnmower.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 11
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin explore hacks for getting special treatment at a restaurant, and Broke Ass Bob finds hacks to save you money. Plus, become your very own sushi chef.

programme.title: Hack My Life S2 12
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin discover the best ways to inflate a basketball, explore the birth of the fanny pack, and end up with a fruity explosion. Plus, Pitchman uncovers the best ways to unclog drains, pit cherries, and grate cheese.

programme.title: Arrow S2 3
programme.desc: When medicine for Glades Memorial Hospital is being hijacked by thieves, Oliver gets into a heated battle with China White and her new partner, the Bronze Tiger, over the supplies.

programme.title: Arrow S2 4
programme.desc: When a dangerous criminal from Lance's past (MICHAEL EKLUND) escapes from prison, Felicity offers herself up as bait so Arrow, Diggle and Lance can capture him...but plans go awry.

programme.title: Arrow S2 5
programme.desc: When an illegal gun-runner who goes by the name "The Mayor" (CLE BENNETT) seriously injures Sin (BEX TAYLOR-KLAUS), The Canary (CAITY LOTZ) sets out for revenge.

programme.title: Arrow S2 6
programme.desc: While Oliver tends to the Canary's wounds, he tries to get her to talk. But when they're both attacked by the League of Assassins, she confesses that she's connected.

programme.title: Arrow S2 7
programme.desc: Diggle heads to Russia to follow a lead on Deadshot (MICHAEL ROWE) in Moscow. When Oliver and Felicity decide to join him, things get complicated when Isabel shows up as well.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 7
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys try to smooch strangers on the streets of Manhattan, play a word game with unsuspecting shoppers, and try not to be camera shy when they're forced to pose as photographers.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S2 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. In the season finale, the guys toy with customers at a candy store using bizarre party props, they all try their hands at nosing, and they break the rules of appropriate elevator etiquette.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 1
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q, and Sal bring you their favorite moments from season one. The guys discuss their most shocking incidents, the best reactions, and reveal never before seen moments from the cutting room floor.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 2
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Q, and Sal bring you more of their favorite hilarity from season one. The guys relive the moments that made them cringe, crack under pressure, and reveal behind the scenes info on the surprises that came out of left field.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S3 3
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys mouth off to patients in a dentist's office, toss popcorn at movie goers in a theater, and take photos for their outrageous blogs in a public park.

programme.title: Georgie & Mandy's First Marriage S1 18
programme.desc: The sequel to Young Sheldon follows Georgie and Mandy as they raise their young family in Texas.

Hero is a word we often hear in the world of sports, but heroism is not always about achievements on the field of play. 42 tells the story of two men -- the great Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) and the legendary Brooklyn Dodgers manager Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford) -- whose brave stand against prejudice forever changed the world by changing the game of baseball. In 1946, Rickey signed Robinson to the team, breaking Major League Baseball's infamous color line. Facing racism from every side, Robinson demonstrated tremendous courage by letting his talent on the field do the talking -- ultimately winning over fans and his teammates, and paving the way for others to follow.

programme.title: Hack My Life Inside Hacks S1 16
programme.desc: Which scientist inspires Kevin the most? How many egg hacks has Brooke tested on the show? Which hack was Kevin most excited to try? And just how much did Americans spend on beer in 2017? All that and more on Inside Hacks.

programme.title: Friends S6 13
programme.desc: Rachel tries to help her pampered younger sister, Jill, find independence--but Jill flirting with Ross is not part of the plan.

programme.title: Friends S6 14
programme.desc: Angry that Rachel interfered in her relationship with Ross, Jill sets out to seduce him.

programme.title: Friends S6 15
programme.desc: Contemplating how differently their lives could have turned out, the friends fantasize about possibilities.

programme.title: Friends S6 16
programme.desc: In the friends' continuing speculative fantasy, Ross initiates a threesome with his wife and her female friend--and gets left out.

programme.title: Friends S6 17
programme.desc: Chandler and Monica agree to give each other homemade presents for their six-month anniversary.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 25
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip out to Hawaii for an auction at a marine life park. T-Money places his bet on what's in a locked cabinet, while Brandon and Lori smell a great deal with old medical equipment.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 26
programme.desc: Still in Hawaii, Sean takes the bidders deep into the island to hidden storage bunkers. Conflict arises between the locals and Sean's usual's, but who will be victorious?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 1
programme.desc: At the port of Los Angeles, Uzi and Shlomi are out to destroy the competition. First, Uzi drives prices through the roof, causing complete chaos on the auction floor. Then, Shlomi plays a hunch on a mysterious container from China that has everyonein a tizzy. Will their strategy pay off?

programme.title: Container Wars S1 2
programme.desc: The biggest auction you've ever seen explodes when rival bidders bet huge sums of money on forfeited international shipping containers. Will the bidders go home with brand new motor vehicles and large carnival antiques, or will they lose tens of thousands of dollars on duds? Each container is a mystery just waiting to be unveiled.

programme.title: Container Wars S1 3
programme.desc: Things get testy when maniac Matt goes toe-to-tow with the Israelis on a container full of high end hunting equipment, and the bidding boils over when Jason tries to one-up them on a promising container from Japan.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 15
programme.desc: Sheldon's selfish demands force Leonard to reconsider their friendship. Meanwhile, Howard tries to pick his astronaut nickname. NASA astronaut MIKE MASSIMINO guest stars.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 16
programme.desc: When Sheldon is forced to take a vacation by the university, he goes to work with Amy in her neurobiology lab.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 17
programme.desc: When a corner office at the University opens up, Sheldon must compete for it with his office nemesis, Barry Kripke. Meanwhile, Penny receives an unusual gift from Amy.

programme.title: Dirty Money S1 12
programme.desc: The Direstas quickly learn that money does grow on trees as they stumble across a concrete forest.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 7
programme.desc: Georgie and Mandy get married! Meanwhile, Meemaw’s gambling room gets raided.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S7 8
programme.desc: Sheldon studies to be Meemaw’s lawyer when she is put on house arrest, and the Coopers have a plumbing emergency.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S5 18
programme.desc: A change in Sheldon's routine forces him to re-evaluate his entire life, when his barber is sick. Meanwhile, Howard rethinks his decision to go into space after astronaut training

programme.title: Saiyuki Reload -Zeroin-
programme.desc: Sanzo and others fight with Hazel and release a girl who is caught by yokai. At night, Hazel asks Sanzo to help…

programme.title: Saiyuki Reload -Zeroin-
programme.desc: Sanzo and others happily visit a crowded town that is said to be protected by an anti-yokai magical barrier.

programme.title: Saiyuki Reload -Zeroin-
programme.desc: Attracted by the good smell of fruits, Goku enters the forest alone. He finds a yokai lying down on the ground.

programme.title: Saiyuki Reload -Zeroin-
programme.desc: Sanzo and others arrive in the next town. There live many people with yellow eyes peacefully who are revived by Hazel.

programme.title: The Foolish Angel Dances With The Devil

programme.title: The Foolish Angel Dances With The Devil

programme.title: The Foolish Angel Dances With The Devil

programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome To The Jungle
programme.desc: In the brand new adventure Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle, the tables are turned as four teenagers are sucked into the world of Jumanji.

programme.title: Sight Unseen (Season 1)
programme.desc: Diagnosed with Leber's Neuropathy, homicide detective Tess Avery (Dolly Lewis) quits the police force after nearly getting her partner, Jake Campbell (Daniel Gillies), killed. Unwilling to accept help, or even admit her new reality, Tess turns to an assistive app to help navigate the world around her while still "passing" as sighted.

programme.title: Sight Unseen (Season 1)
programme.desc: When the hit and run victim from one of Tess' (Dolly Lewis) former cases awakes from a coma, Sunny (Agam Darshi) encourages Tess to track down new leads even though she's no longer on the force.

programme.title: Coroner (Season 3)
programme.desc: Jenny and Donovan help a young girl who seeks the truth about her father’s death.

programme.title: Coroner (Season 3)
programme.desc: After a gruesome discovery at a body farm, Jenny and Donovan unearth a small town’s tragic secrets.

programme.title: Coroner (Season 3)
programme.desc: After a night of partying, Ross finds himself embroiled in a murder investigation.

programme.title: The Blacklist (Season 10)
programme.desc: The Task Force races against the clock to recover a valuable asset stolen from the US government. Red hatches a plan to help track down the perpetrators.

programme.title: The Blacklist (Season 10)
programme.desc: After an inmate opens fire at a high-security prison, the Task Force investigates a contraband smuggler known as The Postman. Cooper revisits his past ties to the suspect.

programme.title: Sight Unseen (Season 1)
programme.desc: When Tess (Dolly Lewis) inserts herself into Jake's (Daniel Gillies) investigation to find the identity of a dead John Doe, she confronts conflicting emotions - fearing for her brother Lucas' (Alec Santos) life while driven to do the thing she loves most: solve the case.

programme.title: Sight Unseen (Season 1)
programme.desc: Jake (Daniel Gillies) encourages Tess (Dolly Lewis) to talk to Superintendent Bennett (Roger Cross) about getting her old job back, but her hopes are cut short by his disappointing offer to join the Metro PD only to ride a desk.

programme.title: Elsbeth (Season 2)
programme.desc: Elsbeth and the team retrace Mac's steps to find the truth.

programme.title: Whacked Out Sports (Season 16)
programme.desc: On this episode, Flipping out! The family that skydives together stays together, and jumping out of your friend's car never looked so cozy!

programme.title: NCIS: Origins (Season 1)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome To The Jungle

programme.title: First Weapons - Returning Boomerang

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin - Episode 2

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A tired American ex-boxer returns to his native hamlet in Ireland to win the hand of a spirited young woman. He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Al Pacino), now in his 60s, seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A romantically challenged morning show producer is reluctantly embroiled in a series of outrageous tests by her chauvinistic correspondent, host of a TV segment titled "The Ugly Truth," to prove his theories on relationships and help her find love. His clever ploys, however, lead to an unexpected result.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Never Leave
programme.desc: Strange incidents keep happening in Lin Yue's house after a car accident: her sister cannot see the images of her family members in the mirror; her father is peeping at night; and there is the sound of marbles from the attic every day at dawn. programme.desc: A struggling writer must write a hit novel to save his career. He retreats to his childhood home where his father, also a successful writer, died mysteriously. Upon discovering his father's final manuscript, he realizes it's far superior to anything he could create. He decides to plagiarize the work, setting off a series of horrifying events.

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Lost Memories
programme.desc: As a young mother grapples with her daughter's mysterious disappearance, a series of eerie events unfold. These events could be linked to the vengeful ghosts of a tragic accident that happened 20 years ago...

programme.title: Booked: First Day In
programme.desc: A first-timer is arrested for reckless driving while on the way to vacation, and a man is brought in on a brandishing a firearm charge while open-carrying in Virginia Beach.

programme.title: The First 48 (S25)
programme.desc: In Tulsa, Det. White needs a former student to tell the truth about a shooting at an apartment complex. In Gwinnett, a man is shot in front of his friend as a robbery takes a deadly turn.

programme.title: After The First 48 (S14)
programme.desc: Detectives in Tulsa have only one witness to a domestic dispute that's escalated to a double homicide — a 12-year-old girl. Their case hangs on this question: will she or won't she be able to testify?

programme.title: Digital Addiction
programme.desc: Wayne's digital use has led him down a destructive path of porn addiction and more. Carissa dreams of helping others through online connections, but she doesn't realize she needs to help herself first.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14)
programme.desc: Lia's hoarding went into overdrive when her three sons moved out, and Lia's husband, Ken, worked full time. After a severe blood infection, Lia realizes the extreme danger her home presents to her.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Tales of toxic love triangles—wives who stray from their husbands with disastrous results, a deadly case of online catfishing, and a lonely young woman who has an affair with a killer.

programme.title: Beyond the Headlines: The Tanya Kach Story With Elizabeth Smart
programme.desc: In a revealing conversation, Tanya recounts the horror of the 10 years she spent in captivity in her predator's bedroom, and confides in Elizabeth about the realities of grooming.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A man accused of indecency with a child's doll faces his accuser in court; an arsonist who killed nine people hears it from the judge; a multi-murder suspect misbehaves in the courtroom; and more.

programme.title: Court Cam (S6)
programme.desc: A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments. An accused murderer attacks a courtroom deputy; a 9-year-old boy confronts his father's killer; and more.

programme.title: My Ghost Story Asia (S3)
programme.desc: My Ghost Story Asia Season 3 once again features true accounts with the supernatural told by the people who experienced them, from chance encounters in haunted spaces to deep personal experiences.

programme.desc: A first-timer is arrested for reckless driving while on the way to vacation, and a man is brought in on a brandishing a firearm charge while open-carrying in Virginia Beach.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S1)
programme.desc: Iowa home-baker, Justina Rucinski, had just received the largest cookie request of her career. But when the customer arrived at Justina's house, she was brutally attacked and taken away at gunpoint.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S1)
programme.desc: One week before her Senior Prom, Queena Phu pulled into her local library. While she was on the phone with her best friend Rachel, the line suddenly went dead. Rachel and Queena’s family detail the horror.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: When loving couple Gary and Linda Haas fail to reach their vacation campsite, New Mexico State Police are called in to investigate. With no evidence or witnesses, all they can do is scour CCTV footage.

programme.title: See No Evil (S6)
programme.desc: When Marcel Reardon is discovered bludgeoned to death outside an apartment building, his friends deny all knowledge of his murder. But detectives are convinced at least one of them is lying.

programme.title: Tell Me How I Died
programme.desc: When a young woman dies in a car crash, it's up to the Coroner's Office to trigger an investigation into an accident that may have involved foul play.

programme.title: The Life & Murder Of Nicole Brown Simpson
programme.desc: OJ’s behaviour sparks a media frenzy, culminating in a high-profile trial. His ongoing violence raises concerns about what happened to Sydney and Justin.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S2)
programme.desc: Ten years after a young mother allegedly abandoned her family, her mother-in-law reveals a shocking secret: she believes both of her daughter-in-law's lovers murdered her.

programme.title: Witness To Murder: Digital Evidence
programme.desc: After a young woman is found dead in her bathtub, the investigation focuses in on her estranged husband and her boyfriend. An unexpected digital clue has one of them confessing to the murder.

programme.title: Booked: First Day In
programme.desc: A man is arrested for driving his golf cart while intoxicated and refuses a breathalyser test. A young man with LSD and hashish learns the hard way that hanging with underage girls is a very bad idea.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Alternative Learning System
programme.desc: These episodes focus on the process of planning, setting up, and running a small business. These episodes also talk about entrepreneurial skills.

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 4 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang iba't ibang uri ng pangungusap at ang paggamit ng balangkas sa pagpapakita ng nakalap na impormasyon. Matutuhan din dito kung paano magpahayag ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon.

programme.title: Grade 4 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the concept of area and volume of triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids. These episodes also teach about bar graphs and simple experiments.

programme.title: Grade 4 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about writing short stories and journals. These episodes also talk about different sources of information.

programme.title: Grade 4 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang pang-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa kaniyang mga karapatan at tungkulin bilang mamamayang Filipino.

programme.title: Grade 4 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the different types of soil, the different sources of water suitable for human consumption, components of weather using simple instruments, and the Sun as the main source of heat and light on Earth.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagpapahayag at pagsusulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, pagsusuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at paggawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: These episodes are about composing clear and coherent sentences and writing a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa pag-unawa at pagpapahalaga sa patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Filipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the effects of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga elemento nito. Tatalakayin din dito ang pagpapahayag ng pansariling paniniwala at malikhaing pagsusulat.

programme.title: Grade 8 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of inequalities in a triangle, and parallel and perpendicular lines. These episodes also teach about the key concepts of probability.

programme.title: Grade 8 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the different sources of information and grammatical signals. These also talk about communicating skills and writing paragraphs.

programme.title: Grade 8 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa kahalagahan ng pakikipag- ugnayan at sama-samang pagkilos sa kontemporanyong daigdig tungo sa pandaigdigang kapayapaan, pagkakaisa, pagtutulungan, at kaunlaran.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about the digestive system and its interaction with other body systems, the diseases that result from nutrient deficiency and ingestion of harmful substances. These episodes also talk about how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, the concept of species, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Grade 10 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tumatalakay sa iba't ibang akda at maikling kuwento na may kinalaman sa kulturang Asyano. Susuriin din dito ang mga tauhan, mahahalagang pangyayari, at kaisipan sa binasang akda.

programme.title: Grade 10 Math
programme.desc: These episodes explain the key concepts of measures of position.

programme.title: Grade 10 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on writing research reports, giving definitions, and observing correct grammar.

programme.title: Grade 10 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa kahalagahan ng pagkamamamayan at pakikilahok sa mga gawaing pansibiko tungo sa pagkakaroon ng pamayanan at bansang maunlad, mapayapa, at may pagkakaisa.

programme.title: Grade 10 Science
programme.desc: These episodes teach about how gases behave based on the motion and relative distances between gas particles, the structure of biomolecules. These episodes also explain the chemical reactions associated with biological and industrial processes affecting life and the environment.

programme.title: Parent-Teacher Activity Time
programme.desc: These episodes are intented to help parents and teachers in teaching and guiding their children and students. These explain different topics that will help them be prepared for the distance learning set up.

programme.title: Les Étoiles Du Chocolat Belge
programme.desc: The competition is about to reach its climax with a spectacular semi-final on the Grand-Place in Brussels, with the creation of three chocolate sculptures. At the end of this trial, only three candidates will move forward to the final, where they need to make a monumental buffet.

programme.title: Meurtres À Blois
programme.desc: During a performance at the Château de Blois, an industrialist is murdered as he plays the role of Henri III. Arthur, the young actor playing the Duke of Guise, becomes prime suspect. Police Captain Alice Deschamps heads the investigation with her ex and Arthur's father, Detective Inspector Denis Frécant.

programme.title: Dj Battle Africa - La Finale
programme.desc: For three seasons, the most talented DJs from different African regions have competed in incredible battles. But who is the best of the best DJs in Africa? Winners and finalists will compete in this fourth season, which will culminate in a grand finale on the beach of Abidjan.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: An IT student crashes onto the slopes of a volcano during a flight by paraglider. The autopsy reveals that it wasn't the accident that caused death, but an excess of alcohol. But how could he have taken off single-handed and alone, if he was already in an alcoholic coma?

programme.title: Opj
programme.desc: The investigation has now moved to explore student initiation ceremonies and fresher parties on Réunion Island, particularly those concerning a community composed of boys from good families. Rejoicing in their sense of entitlement, the youngsters get their kicks from revealing the intimate side of other people's lives...

programme.title: Y'a Pas De Planète B
programme.desc: Each year, we produce more and more plastic. And plastic is everywhere. Especially in waste. Can we recycle plastic materials forever for example? Or can we convert them into ''organic'' plastic? We take a closer look in the company of Aurore Richel, chemist.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Terriennes
programme.desc: The ''Terriennes'' portal: a site in French on the status of women around the world. The site: www.tv5monde.com/terriennes

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: À La Recherche Du Légume Star
programme.desc: All the world's vegetables have come together with just one idea in mind: to find themselves on every plate and make every child love them. For that, they each pass before the judges and offer the very best of themselves, in the hope of being awarded the highest marks.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Super Plex
programme.desc: Super Plex is no ordinary cucumber: he dreams of becoming a super-hero! And he's ready to do whatever it takes to achieve his aim, despite his not particularly practical oblong shape. With the help of friends as tenacious as himself, he confronts the challenges necessary to reach his objective.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Kenda
programme.desc: Thanks to the help and support of her friends, Kenda tackles all those little everyday problems with optimism. The children's adventures also offer them an opportunity to understand the importance of human values and the world that surrounds them.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Têtes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Vic pretends to be disabled to avoid showing her legs at the swimming pool, but her plan goes awry when she meets Xavier in a wheelchair. Meanwhile Félix tries to justify himself after the low mark he had in an oral exam.

programme.title: Ernest Et Célestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Célestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Football - Ligue 1 Mcdonald'S
programme.desc: A match from the French football championship.

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Basik
programme.desc: The programme which explores and explains the economy, examines our relationship to money and analyses our purchasing power. The economic, social and environmental challenges of tomorrow are covered in a direct, down-to-earth and occasionally mischievous manner!

programme.title: À Bon Entendeur
programme.desc: 'aBE'' examines a wide range of topics affecting everyday life in everyday homes: it tests products, compares prices, highlights fraudulent practices, raises consumer awareness and questions manufacturers. The programme addresses economic, social, environmental and health issues and talks about leisure activities, technology...

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Le Grand Cactus
programme.desc: Humour with spikes on! Phony reports, high-jacked programmes, pretend live broadcasts, mock celebrity interviews, fake adverts, street interviews... With their team of presenters, Adrien Devyver and Jérôme de Warzée bring their own unique twist to news from Belgium and around the world, so prepare for a result that's distinctly... lively!

programme.title: Échappées Belles
programme.desc: Lying between Quebec and Nova Scotia, New Brunswick is a unique destination in Canada. First, it is the only officially bilingual province. Second, it forms the historical heart of Acadia, where nearly 250,000 French speakers still live today. Acadians continue to proudly defend their traditions and customs.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Rendez-Vous Au Parc
programme.desc: A peri-urban nature park since 2010, the Wildnispark Zürich Sihlwald offers a unique combination of forest, natural landscapes and wildlife, very close to Zurich and Zug. The chance to take a walk in a storybook forest that seems to have come straight out of a distant past.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Tant Que Le Soleil Frappe
programme.desc: Max, a committed and persistent landscaper, has been working on a wild garden project in an impoverished district in Marseille. After years of refusal, his proposal reaches the final of an architecture contest.
